Text:
Ancient and useless with Lion or Mountain Lion. I have 9.5.2 and that is just as useless!

Tuxera NTFS only solution!

@bjornagainswede - Um, did the uploader state that this was for Lion or Mountain Lion?  No, he didn't.  There ARE other Mac users out there that have earlier O.S. versions, asshole ... me included.

So, um, shut the fuck up and move along, you arrogant fuck.  If it doesn't apply to you or what you have, why even bother commenting, asshole?

'Sides ... Paragon and Tuxera are about evenly matched.  I have both.  Next time?  Next time be a little bit more appreciative of someone's efforts.

God, I fucking hate ungrateful, know-it-all motherfuckers.

ClubQball
Next time you write here, wash your dirty mouth and save us from your low-spoken street language. Get some education !
@Cachorro - FUCK YOU.  Got something else to say, motherfucker?  I wasn't even speaking to or addressing you in the first fucking place, so mind your own goddamned business, dickless.

LMAO!!!
Oh yeah... thanks for the upload ocruz3!

@bjornagainswede
thanks for the heads up. what you wrote DID contribute to this torrent. fyi, letting people know it won't (or will, for that matter) work with a specific update is neither arrogant not ungrateful.
